EmailTemplate.name: Auto Response New Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Support Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your email. A support request has been created for you.
Support Case #: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Click here to go to the support case. Please do not edit and change anything in the subject line.
Thank you,
Support team
[{!Case.Thread_Id}]
